mapper.select: /*getCardLossList*/ SELECT A.*, DATE_FORMAT(A.REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS REG_DE, DI.DOC_NO FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_TP_CARD_LOSS A LEFT JOIN DJ_CAMTIC.A_DOC_INFO DI ON A.DOC_ID = DI.DOC_ID WHERE EMP_SEQ = #{empSeq}
/*getCardManager*/ SELECT * FROM CAM_MNG.DJ_CARD_MANAGER WHERE REPLACE(CARD_BA_NB, '-', '') = #{cardBaNb}
mapper.insert:
/*insertCardLoss*/ INSERT INTO CAM_INSIDE.DJ_TP_CARD_LOSS ( EMP_NM, EMP_SEQ, DEPT_SEQ, DEPT_NAME, CARD_NO, CARD_MST, CL_DE, CL_LOC, CL_ISS ) VALUES ( #{empName}, #{empSeq}, #{deptSeq}, #{deptName}, #{cardNo}, #{cardMst}, #{clDe}, #{clLoc}, #{clIss} )
SELECT AUTO_INCREMENT FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'CAM_INSIDE' AND TABLE_NAME = 'DJ_TP_CARD_LOSS'
mapper.update: /*updateCardLoss*/ UPDATE CAM_INSIDE.DJ_TP_CARD_LOSS SET EMP_NM = #{empName}, EMP_SEQ = #{empSeq}, DEPT_SEQ = #{deptSeq}, DEPT_NAME = #{deptName}, CARD_NO = #{cardNo}, CARD_MST = #{cardMst}, CL_DE = #{clDe}, CL_LOC = #{clLoc}, CL_ISS = #{clIss} WHERE TP_CL_SN = #{tpClSn}
mapper.select: /*getCardLossData*/ SELECT TCL.*, DI.APPRO_KEY, DI.DOC_MENU_CD FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_TP_CARD_LOSS TCL LEFT JOIN DJ_CAMTIC.A_DOC_INFO DI ON TCL.DOC_ID = DI.DOC_ID WHERE TCL.TP_CL_SN = #{tpClSn}

mapper.select: /*getAccCertData*/ SELECT TAC.*, DI.APPRO_KEY, DI.DOC_MENU_CD FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_TP_ACC_CERT TAC LEFT JOIN DJ_CAMTIC.A_DOC_INFO DI ON TAC.DOC_ID = DI.DOC_ID WHERE ACC_CERT_SN = #{accCertSn}
mapper.insert:
/*insertCorpBank*/ INSERT INTO CAM_INSIDE.DJ_TP_CORP_BANK ( EMP_NAME, EMP_SEQ, DEPT_SEQ, DEPT_NAME, PJT_SN, BANK, ISS_DE, USE_RMK, CORP_EXP, REG_EMP_SEQ ) VALUES ( #{empName}, #{empSeq}, #{deptSeq}, #{deptName}, #{pjtSn}, #{bank}, #{issDe}, #{useRmk}, #{corpExp}, #{empSeq} )

mapper.update: /*updateCorpBank*/ UPDATE CAM_INSIDE.DJ_TP_CORP_BANK SET EMP_NAME = #{empName}, EMP_SEQ = #{empSeq}, DEPT_SEQ = #{deptSeq}, DEPT_NAME = #{deptName}, PJT_SN = #{pjtSn}, BANK = #{bank}, ISS_DE = #{issDe}, USE_RMK = #{useRmk}, CORP_EXP = #{corpExp}, MOD_EMP_SEQ = #{empSeq}, MOD_DT = now() WHERE CORP_BANK_SN = #{corpBankSn}
mapper.select: /*getCorpBankData*/ SELECT A.*, DATE_FORMAT(A.REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS REG_DATE FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_TP_CORP_BANK A WHERE CORP_BANK_SN = #{corpBankSn}

/*getCorpBankList*/ SELECT A.*, DATE_FORMAT(A.REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS REG_DE, (SELECT BS_TITLE FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PROJECT WHERE PJT_SN = A.PJT_SN) AS BS_TITLE FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_TP_CORP_BANK A WHERE EMP_SEQ = #{empSeq}

mapper.select: /*getSignetToData*/ SELECT A.*, DATE_FORMAT(A.REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS REG_DE, DI.APPRO_KEY, DI.DOC_MENU_CD FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_TP_SIGNET_TO A LEFT JOIN DJ_CAMTIC.A_DOC_INFO DI ON A.DOC_ID = DI.DOC_ID WHERE SIGN_SN = #{signSn}

mapper.update: /*updateResign*/ UPDATE CAM_INSIDE.DJ_TP_RESIGN SET DEPT_TEAM_NAME = #{deptTeamName}, POSITION = #{position}, REGIST_NO = #{registNo}, JOIN_DAY = #{joinDay}, RESIGN_DAY = #{resignDay}, JOB_DETAIL = #{jobDetail}, RESIGN_TYPE = #{resignType}, RESIGN_ISS = #{resignIss}, EMP_NAME = #{empName}, EMP_SEQ = #{empSeq}, DEPT_SEQ = #{deptSeq}, DEPT_NAME = #{deptName}, MOD_EMP_SEQ = #{empSeq}, MOD_DT = now() WHERE RESIGN_SN = #{resignSn}
mapper.select: /*getResignData*/ SELECT A.*, DI.APPRO_KEY, DI.DOC_MENU_CD FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_TP_RESIGN A LEFT JOIN DJ_CAMTIC.A_DOC_INFO DI ON A.DOC_ID = DI.DOC_ID WHERE RESIGN_SN = #{resignSn}

/*getEmpData*/ SELECT scp.dec_b64('KEY1', HEI.BDAY) AS BDAY, HEI.JOIN_DAY, HEI.JOB_DETAIL, scp.dec_b64('KEY1', HEI.RES_REGIS_NUM) AS REGIST_NO, CONCAT(CASE WHEN HDI.DEPT_LEVEL = 2 THEN (SELECT DEPT_NAME FROM CAM_HR.DJ_DEPT_INFO DI WHERE HDI.PARENT_DEPT_SEQ = DI.DEPT_SEQ) ELSE HEI.DEPT_NAME END, " ", CASE WHEN HDI.DEPT_LEVEL = 2 THEN HEI.DEPT_NAME ELSE "" END) AS DEPT_TEAM_NAME FROM CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO HEI LEFT JOIN CAM_HR.DJ_DEPT_INFO HDI ON HEI.DEPT_SEQ = HDI.DEPT_SEQ WHERE EMP_SEQ = #{empSeq}
/*getResignList*/ SELECT A.*, DATE_FORMAT(A.REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS REG_DE, DI.DOC_NO FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_TP_RESIGN A LEFT JOIN DJ_CAMTIC.A_DOC_INFO DI ON A.DOC_ID = DI.DOC_ID WHERE EMP_SEQ = #{empSeq}
mapper.insert:

mapper.select: /*getDetailsData*/ SELECT A.*, DI.APPRO_KEY, DI.DOC_MENU_CD FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_TP_DETAILS A LEFT JOIN DJ_CAMTIC.A_DOC_INFO DI ON A.DOC_ID = DI.DOC_ID WHERE DET_SN = #{detSn}

FILE_TYPE,
REG_EMP_SEQ ) VALUES ( #{empSeq}, #{empName}, #{deptSeq}, #{deptName}, #{position}, #{joinDe},

#{fileType},

mapper.update: /*updateLeave*/ UPDATE CAM_INSIDE.DJ_TP_LEAVE SET LEAVE_TYPE = #{leaveType}, STR_DE = #{strDe}, END_DE = #{endDe}, LEAVE_CONT = #{leaveCont}, ETC = #{etc}, FILE_TYPE = #{fileType}, MOD_EMP_SEQ = #{empSeq}, MOD_DT = now() WHERE LEAVE_SN = #{leaveSn}
mapper.select: /*getLeaveData*/ SELECT A.*, DI.APPRO_KEY, DI.DOC_MENU_CD FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_TP_LEAVE A LEFT JOIN DJ_CAMTIC.A_DOC_INFO DI ON A.DOC_ID = DI.DOC_ID WHERE LEAVE_SN = #{leaveSn}

AND A.STATUS = #{status} AND A.LEAVE_SN NOT IN (SELECT LEAVE_SN FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_TP_REINSTAT)
